hero.title: Document Translation Studio
hero.subtitle: Manage OCR and translation in one workspace and export results instantly.
hero.demoDesc: Upload your file, extract text, translate, and download the output.

features.title: Everything in One Panel
features.subtitle: All processing happens in the browser. No backend required.

ocr.title: Advanced OCR
ocr.desc: Extract text from PDF or images with page progress tracking.

fast.title: Fast and Private
fast.desc: Your data stays in the browser with full control.

steps.title: Ready in 3 Steps
steps.subtitle: Upload and deploy without a backend.

step1.label: Step 1
step1.title: Upload File
step1.desc: Drag & drop a PDF or image.

step2.label: Step 2
step2.title: OCR + Translate
step2.desc: Extract text, choose a target language, translate.

step3.label: Step 3
step3.title: Download Output
step3.desc: Download text or save to history.

workspace.title: Workspace
workspace.subtitle: OCR, translation, and history in one place.
